name: Atomic Decay
description:
*Note, if you see a black screen when first starting, please wait since it takes some time to load.

A short game I made for Ludum Dare 49. I'm fairly new to game dev, so I hope to improve jam by jam. I had a lot of fun making this, and I hope you enjoy!

Instructions:

  • Arrow Keys to Move
  • The mad scientist's reactor is getting unstable. Place the correct color in the depositor to increase stability. 
  • Wrong deposits decrease stability.
  • To get secondary colors, place the corresponding primary colors in the mixer.
  • You're a mad scientist, so you can't just drop stuff. If you pick up something you don't want, place it in the trash chute to get rid of it!
